import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { featuredProject = { name: "Dynamic HRMS Management System", description: `A comprehensive HRMS platform designed to automate attendance, payroll, leave, and performance tracking. Built with Angular and PHP (CodeIgniter), it offers real-time synchronization across departments, dynamic policy configuration, and analytics-driven insights for HR teams.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL", "CodeIgniter"], image: "assets/projects/hrms.jpg", link: "#" }; projects = [ { name: "UbiCRM â€” Customer Relationship Management", description: `A CRM platform that streamlines lead tracking, sales management, and client interactions with real-time analytics and data visualization.`, techStack: ["Angular 17", "AdonisJS", "MySQL", "Highcharts.js"], image: "assets/projects/crm.jpg", link: "#" }, { name: "Organization Management System", description: `A modular platform for managing organization onboarding, subscriptions, and workflow approvals. Improved administrative efficiency by 30%.`, techStack: ["AngularJS", "PHP (CodeIgniter)", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/organization.jpg", link: "#" } ]; }
